an10.85:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahācundo cetīsu viharati sahajātiyaṃ.
an10.85:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā mahācundo bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.85:4.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahācundassa paccassosuṃ.
an10.85:5.2: ‘ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi, ahaṃ saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipī’ti.
an10.85:6.1: Tamenaṃ tathāgato vā tathāgatasāvako vā jhāyī samāpattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyāyakusalo samanuyuñjati samanuggāhati samanubhāsati.
an10.85:6.2: So tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā jhāyinā samāpattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyāyakusalena samanuyuñjiyamāno samanuggāhiyamāno samanubhāsiyamāno irīṇaṃ āpajjati vicinaṃ āpajjati anayaṃ āpajjati byasanaṃ āpajjati anayabyasanaṃ āpajjati.
an10.85:7.1: Tamenaṃ tathāgato vā tathāgatasāvako vā jhāyī samāpattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyāyakusalo evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca manasi karoti:
an10.85:7.2: ‘kiṃ nu kho ayamāyasmā katthī hoti vikatthī adhigamesu—
an10.85:7.3: ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmipi vuṭṭhahāmipi … pe …
an10.85:8.1: Tamenaṃ tathāgato vā tathāgatasāvako vā jhāyī samāpattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyāyakusalo evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti:
an10.85:9.1: ‘Dīgharattaṃ kho ayamāyasmā khaṇḍakārī chiddakārī sabalakārī kammāsakārī na santatakārī na santatavutti sīlesu.
an10.85:9.3: Dussilyaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (1)
an10.85:10.2: assaddhiyaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (2)
an10.85:11.2: appasaccaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (3)
an10.85:12.2: dovacassatā kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (4)
an10.85:13.2: pāpamittatā kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (5)
an10.85:14.2: kosajjaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (6)
an10.85:15.2: muṭṭhassaccaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (7)
an10.85:16.2: kohaññaṃ kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (8)
an10.85:17.2: dubbharatā kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ. (9)
an10.85:18.2: duppaññatā kho pana tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye parihānametaṃ’. (10)
an10.85:19.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sahāyako sahāyakaṃ evaṃ vadeyya:
an10.85:19.2: ‘yadā te, samma, dhanena dhanakaraṇīyaṃ assa, yāceyyāsi maṃ dhanaṃ.
an10.85:19.4: So kiñcideva dhanakaraṇīye samuppanne sahāyako sahāyakaṃ evaṃ vadeyya:
an10.85:19.15: ‘nāhaṃ taṃ, samma, alikaṃ avacaṃ, tucchakaṃ avacaṃ.
an10.85:19.19: ‘alikaṃ maṃ, samma, avaca, tucchakaṃ maṃ, samma, avaca—
an10.85:19.22: ‘nāhaṃ taṃ, samma, alikaṃ avacaṃ, tucchakaṃ avacaṃ.
an10.85:19.26: ‘alikaṃ maṃ, samma, avaca, tucchakaṃ maṃ, samma, avaca—
an10.85:19.29: ‘nāhaṃ taṃ, samma, alikaṃ avacaṃ, tucchakaṃ avacaṃ.
an10.85:19.30: Api ca ahameva ummādaṃ pāpuṇiṃ cetaso vipariyāyan’ti.
an10.85:20.1: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu katthī hoti vikatthī adhigamesu:

an10.85:34.1: So vatāvuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme appahāya imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
